us.derfers.tribex.rapids.GUI.Swing

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.derfers.tribex.rapids.GUI.Swing.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The Main Swing GUI creator. Delegates the creation of widgets, their layout, creating widget interactivity, and styling of widgets.
    Author:
    Nateowami, TribeX

    • Method Detail

      • loadGUI

        public void loadGUI(java.lang.String filePath,
           ScriptEngine engine,
           java.lang.Object parent,
           java.lang.Boolean clearWidgets)
        Starts the JFrame, sets a GridBagLayout TODO: allow layouts to be configurable, Sets the Window Title, loads Styles, and runs loadInComposite to load widgets.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the file to load from.
        engine - The JavaScript engine to run scripts in.
        parent - Optional parent JFrame or Composite. Will be elaborated on soon.
        clearWidgets - Wether or not to clear all widgets out of the parent before loading more into it.

      • loadInComposite

        public static void loadInComposite(javax.swing.JPanel parentComposite,
                   org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                   ScriptEngine engine)
        Loads all XML widgets into the parent composite.
        Parameters:
        parentComposite - A JPanel, at the moment, only the window.getContentPane() really works
        node - The body or any other composite node.
        engine - The JavaScript engine
